com.bcmcgroup.flare.xmldsig

Class Xmldsig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bcmcgroup.flare.xmldsig.Xmldsig

  • public class Xmldsig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to provide convenient methods to digitally sign an XML document.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    David Du , Mark Walters

    • Method Detail

      • signInboxMessage

        public static boolean signInboxMessage(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                       java.lang.String keyStorePath,
                       java.lang.String keyStorePW,
                       java.lang.String keyName,
                       java.lang.String keyPW)
        Method used to create enveloped digital signatures for an for a TAXII Inbox_Message (Content_Block and entire Inbox_Message)
        Parameters:
        doc - Document object containing the source XML document
        keyStorePath - Path to KeyStore used for signing document
        keyStorePW - KeyStore password
        keyName - Alias for private key in KeyStore
        keyPW - Private key password
        Returns:
        true if successful signing, false otherwise Usage Example: String pks = config.getProperty("pathToPublisherKeyStore"); String pksPw = FLAREclientUtil.decrypt(config.getProperty("publisherKeyStorePassword")); String pk = config.getProperty("publisherKeyName"); String pkPw = FLAREclientUtil.decrypt(config.getProperty("publisherKeyPassword")); boolean result = Xmldsig.signInboxMessage(taxiiDocument, pks, pksPw, pk, pkPw);

      • sign

        public static boolean sign(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
           java.security.KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry keyEntry,
           int cbIndex)
        Method used to create an enveloped digital signature for an element of a TAXII document.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to be signed
        keyEntry - the PrivateKeyEntry
        cbIndex - the index of the Content_Block if we're signing a Content_Block, otherwise set to -1 if we're signing the root element
        Returns:
        the status of the operation Usage Example: String pks = config.getProperty("pathToPublisherKeyStore"); String pksPw = FLAREclientUtil.decrypt(config.getProperty("publisherKeyStorePassword")); String keyName = config.getProperty("publisherKeyName"); String keyPW = FLAREclientUtil.decrypt(config.getProperty("publisherKeyPassword")); PrivateKeyEntry keyEntry = FLAREclientUtil.getKeyEntry(pks, pksPw, keyName, keyPW); List statusList = Xmldsig.sign(rootElement, keyEntry, -1);

      • verifySignature

        public static boolean verifySignature(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                      java.lang.String keyStorePath,
                      java.lang.String keyStorePW,
                      java.lang.String verifyAlias)
        Used to verify an enveloped digital signature
        Parameters:
        doc - a Document object containing the xml with the signature
        keyStorePath - a String containing the path to the KeyStore
        keyStorePW - a String containing the KeyStore password
        verifyAlias - a String containing the alias of the public key used for verification
        Returns:
